data.title: [Solved] Sanskrit college at Varanasi was established by?
data.meta_description: Jonathan Duncan - Jonathan Duncan established Sanskrit College at Varanasi to study Hindu law and philosophy in the year 1791.he was Governor of Bomba
data.text:
Detailed Solution

Download Solution PDF

Jonathan Duncan - Jonathan Duncan established Sanskrit College at Varanasi to study Hindu law and philosophy in the year 1791.he was Governor of Bombay..

Sanskrit College in 1974 was renamed to Sampurnanand Sanskrit University.

William Jones - Sir William Jones translated Kalidasa's play "Shakuntala" into English.

James Prinsep - James Princep deciphered Ashoka's Edicts in the year 1837.
